examples: I bought a loaf of bread from the bakery.
She made delicious sandwiches with fresh bread.
Eu comprei um pão na padaria.
Ela fez sanduíches deliciosos com pão fresco.

suggested: Why did the loaf of bread break up with the slice of cheese? It felt too crumby in that relationship!
Sometimes, the word 'bread' can remind us of times when we didn't have enough to eat or struggled to make ends meet.
Why do some people waste so much bread and not appreciate its value? It's so infuriating!
Did you know that bread has been a staple food in various cultures for thousands of years and comes in countless shapes, sizes, and flavors?
The comforting and inviting aroma of freshly baked bread, filling the kitchen or bakery with its delightful scent.
The tactile experience of feeling the softness, warmth, and texture of bread as you hold it, tear it, or bite into it.
Bread often symbolizes nourishment, sharing, and community, as it has been a fundamental part of meals and gatherings throughout history.
